mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hc_form_xm AS "hc_form_xm", a.hc_form_xb AS "hc_form_xb", a.hc_form_sfzh AS "hc_form_sfzh", a.hc_form_zy1 AS "hc_form_zy1", a.hc_form_zy2 AS "hc_form_zy2", a.hc_form_zy3 AS "hc_form_zy3", a.hc_form_szzx AS "hc_form_szzx", a.hc_form_zxdz AS "hc_form_zxdz", a.hc_form_fzrxm AS "hc_form_fzrxm", a.hc_form_fzrdh AS "hc_form_fzrdh", a.hc_form_add1 AS "hc_form_add1", a.hc_form_add2 AS "hc_form_add2", a.hc_form_kuasheng AS "hc_form_kuasheng", a.hc_form_baojiuye AS "hc_form_baojiuye", a.hc_form_yuexin AS "hc_form_yuexin", a.hc_form_xslx AS "hc_form_xslx", a.hc_form_cj AS "hc_form_cj", a.hc_form_province AS "hc_form_province", a.hc_form_city AS "hc_form_city", a.hc_form_area AS "hc_form_area", a.hc_form_dz AS "hc_form_dz", a.hc_form_sj AS "hc_form_sj", a.hc_form_bysj AS "hc_form_bysj", a.hc_form_qq AS "hc_form_qq", a.hc_form_bz AS "hc_form_bz", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rs_student( id, hc_form_xm, hc_form_xb, hc_form_sfzh, hc_form_zy1, hc_form_zy2, hc_form_zy3, hc_form_szzx, hc_form_zxdz, hc_form_fzrxm, hc_form_fzrdh, hc_form_add1, hc_form_add2, hc_form_kuasheng, hc_form_baojiuye, hc_form_yuexin, hc_form_xslx, hc_form_cj, hc_form_province, hc_form_city, hc_form_area, hc_form_dz, hc_form_sj, hc_form_bysj, hc_form_qq, hc_form_bz, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hc_form_xm}, #{hc_form_xb}, #{hc_form_sfzh}, #{hc_form_zy1}, #{hc_form_zy2}, #{hc_form_zy3}, #{hc_form_szzx}, #{hc_form_zxdz}, #{hc_form_fzrxm}, #{hc_form_fzrdh}, #{hc_form_add1}, #{hc_form_add2}, #{hc_form_kuasheng}, #{hc_form_baojiuye}, #{hc_form_yuexin}, #{hc_form_xslx}, #{hc_form_cj}, #{hc_form_province}, #{hc_form_city}, #{hc_form_area}, #{hc_form_dz}, #{hc_form_sj}, #{hc_form_bysj}, #{hc_form_qq}, #{hc_form_bz}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rs_student SET hc_form_xm = #{hc_form_xm}, hc_form_xb = #{hc_form_xb}, hc_form_sfzh = #{hc_form_sfzh}, hc_form_zy1 = #{hc_form_zy1}, hc_form_zy2 = #{hc_form_zy2}, hc_form_zy3 = #{hc_form_zy3}, hc_form_szzx = #{hc_form_szzx}, hc_form_zxdz = #{hc_form_zxdz}, hc_form_fzrxm = #{hc_form_fzrxm}, hc_form_fzrdh = #{hc_form_fzrdh}, hc_form_add1 = #{hc_form_add1}, hc_form_add2 = #{hc_form_add2}, hc_form_kuasheng = #{hc_form_kuasheng}, hc_form_baojiuye = #{hc_form_baojiuye}, hc_form_yuexin = #{hc_form_yuexin}, hc_form_xslx = #{hc_form_xslx}, hc_form_cj = #{hc_form_cj}, hc_form_province = #{hc_form_province}, hc_form_city = #{hc_form_city}, hc_form_area = #{hc_form_area}, hc_form_dz = #{hc_form_dz}, hc_form_sj = #{hc_form_sj}, hc_form_bysj = #{hc_form_bysj}, hc_form_qq = #{hc_form_qq}, hc_form_bz = #{hc_form_bz}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
